data.text: Awa e hino nafa toɓɓere nde wonɗen yewtude fii mun nden: hiɗen mari wano oo *yottinoowo mawɗo sadaka ka Alla, jooɗiiɗo ka sengo ɲaamo jullere laamu Alla Mawɗo on ka kammuuli.
Ko o golloowo ka nder nokkuure hormorde, ɗun ko ka *rewirdu goongaaru, hara hinaa ndu yimɓe ɓen darni, kono ko Joomiraaɗo on.
Kala yottinoowo mawɗo ko toɗɗoraa ko fii weeɓitangol Alla dokke e sadakaaji, bee yottinoowo men mawɗo on kadi heɓa goɗɗun ko o weeɓita.
Si tawno himo ka hoore leydi, o wonataano yottinoowo sadaka, ɓay no woodi weeɓitooɓe dokke, hara ko no yaadiri e Sariya on.

Ɓen no waɗude dewal ngal tawata ko mbaadi e ɗowdi goongaaji kammuyankeeji ɗin, wano Muusaa ɓanginiranaa non fewndo ko o darnata rewirdu ndun, Alla daalani mo: «Ndaaru, a waɗiray fow noone no holliraɗaa non ka hoore fello.»
Kono jooni, *Almasiihu on heɓii golle ɓurɗe mawnude ɗe ɓeya ɗen, no o woniri non holnuɗo *ahadi ɓurndi moƴƴude ndin, sincaandi e fodaariiji ɓurɗi kelɗude ɗin.
Si tawno ahadi araniri ndin wonno ndi felnaaki, hewtataano ka wonndi ɗaɓɓee.
E hin-le ko e hoore feloore Alla daalani jamaa mun on:
Ko fii mi yaafoyto ellaaji maɓɓe ɗin,
Ka o inni ndin ahadi heyri ɗon, ko ɗon o watti araniri ndin hinndi. E hin-le hinndi ndin nawyii, no e moggo mulugol.
